content.text: Hi, I'm Hannah. What's your name?
Hi Hannah, my name is Sarah. It's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too, Sarah. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to paint, cook, and play cello.
That's awesome! I love to paint too. What's your favorite thing to paint?
I love to paint landscapes and flowers. They're so calming and peaceful.
I agree! They're beautiful. Do you have any of your paintings online?
I do! I have a few on Instagram.
Oh cool, I'll check them out. I'd love to see your work.
Thanks, Hannah. I'd love to see some of yours too.
Sure, I can share some of mine with you.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
